name: BuddyCart
desc: BuddyCart is an online shopping website that specializes in providing groceries and items for general needs to customers in the local area. The website is designed to provide customers with a hassle-free shopping experience from the comfort of their own homes.
highlights: Used the JSON-Server to Fetch the data

name: Brief.ly
desc: This portfolio showcases a web application project that offers link shortening, detailed analytics, and QR code generation. With the ability to transform long URLs into concise formats, track essential metrics, and convert links and UPI details into QR codes, this project provides users with efficient and insightful tools for link sharing and information sharing. The application's user-friendly interface and responsive design ensure a seamless experience across devices.
highlights: Shorten URLs and convert link to QR and create custom QR codes for custom payments

name: ShoeKeeper
desc: ShoeKeeper is an online shopping website that specializes in providing a wide range of shoes to customers around the world. The website is designed with a user-friendly interface that allows customers to easily browse and purchase their desired footwear.
highlights: On Landing page, product detail cards data Fetch through API.
Product Page with Filter by Product , Sort by Price

name: CosmetiCare
desc: CosmetiCare is an Indian online marketplace for beauty and wellness products. It offers a wide range of skincare, haircare, makeup, and personal care products from various brands.
highlights: On Landing page, product detail cards data Fetch through API.
Product Page with Filter by Product , Sort by Price
